creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
image_copyright: © Joe Minter / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York
medium: Mixed media assemblage of found objects
text: A rickety chair upon and through which numerous garden and agricultural implements have been attached and thrust, including a shovel and a hoe. The objects sprout from the seat and also include imagery like the American flag, a ship, and other kinds of objects.
title: Voyage in Chains
